document_data.name: Hank
document_data.mainbody: '''Hank the Double-Bitted''' was a high-ranking officer of [[Muktar]] in [[Turmish]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Hank was the leader of the [[Champions of Muktar]]. His weapon of choice was axes, hence his nickname.
document_data.History:
Hank was a veteran fighter of the wars in Turmish.

In [[1358 DR]], Hank and his fellow Champions arranged a trap inside [[Fort Blood]], planned by the self-styled king of [[Muktar]], [[Yrkhetep|Hetep]], to eliminate an adventuring party well-known in [[Golconda]].

Later, he led the Muktar army in the [[Battle of Wilma Pass]].
document_data.Rumors: It said that once Hank had killed alone a [[black dragon]].
